name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Note Me - Save your Important Notes, Prompts, To Do list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage your important notes, prompts, and to-do lists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note Me is your all-in-one solution for organizing thoughts, ideas, and tasks. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative mind, this powerful Chrome extension helps you capture and manage information effortlessly.

Key Features:
ðŸ”¹ Notes: Jot down ideas, insights, and important information.
ðŸ”¹ Prompts: Store writing prompts, conversation starters, or creative inspiration.
ðŸ”¹ To-Do Lists: Keep track of tasks and boost your productivity.
ðŸ”¹ Quick Add: Easily add new items with just a few clicks.
ðŸ”¹ Search: Find your notes and prompts instantly.
ðŸ”¹ Export/Import: Backup and restore your data with ease.
ðŸ”¹ Text Selection: Save selected text from any webpage (optional feature).

How to Use Note Me:

ðŸ”¹ Click on the Note Me icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the extension.
ðŸ”¹ Navigate between Notes, To-Do, and Prompts using the tabs at the top.
ðŸ”¹ To add a new item, click the "Add New" button in the respective tab.
ðŸ”¹ Edit or delete items using the buttons provided.
ðŸ”¹ Use the search bar to quickly find specific notes or prompts.
ðŸ”¹ Export your data for backup or import previously saved data. Please DO NOT uninstall or reinstall the Extensions without taking the backup (json).

FAQs:

Q: Is my data secure?
A: Yes, all your data is stored locally in your browser. We don't collect or store any personal information.

Q: Can I sync my data across devices?
A: Currently, Note Me stores data locally. However, you can use the export/import feature to manually transfer data between devices.

Q: How do I enable the text selection feature?
A: Go to the Settings tab and toggle on the "Enable text selection feature" option.

Q: What file formats are supported for export/import?
A: Note Me supports JSON format for both export and import, ensuring data integrity.

Q: Is there a limit to how many notes, prompts, or to-do items I can create?
A: There's no set limit, but keep in mind that the extension uses Chrome's storage API, which has its own limitations.
